title: Five Nights at Freddy’s Security Breach is coming soon to Google Stadia
content:
There haven’t been many major releases on Google Stadia so far this year, but today the platform is announcing a pretty big new addition. Coming soon, last year’s entry in the Five Nights at Freddy’s series, Security Breach, will be available on Google Stadia.

more…

The post Five Nights at Freddy’s Security Breach is coming soon to Google Stadia appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Announced this week, Google will be bringing Five Nights at Freddy's Security Breach to its Stadia cloud gaming platform.
